objectSizeGreaterThan.description: Minimum object size to which the rule applies. Value must be at least `0` if specified.

objectSizeLessThan.description: Maximum object size to which the rule applies. Value must be at least `1` if specified.

prefix.description: Prefix identifying one or more objects to which the rule applies.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. All of these tags must exist in the object's tag set in order for the rule to apply.
